title: Mail checking times on Thunderbord Mobile (Android)
creator: LarsErikOsterud
content: I miss one thing from the regular Android mail app. The possibilty to set a time periode for mail checking. Like check each hour from 09:00 to 23:00. (to make it NOT check for mail at night)
